infobox.Japanese title:: 潮入り公園逆転事件  (Shio-iri Kōen Gyakuten Jiken?)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri

Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Atsushi Ono as Teruhiko Motoi  Yukiko Amada as Kazuri Keitoku  Jiro Saito as Yuta Kimishima  Kaoru Morota as Aoi Kimishima  Oki Sugiyama as Keisuke Sugao  Shinpachi Tsuji as Eizaburo Tanba
infobox.Opening song:: Sekai wa Anata no Iro ni Naru

sections.Situation:
One afternoon, Kogoro, Ran, and Conan were at a tidal park in Chiba, enjoying the scenery. After low tide occurred, Kogoro was about to take them to an all-you-can-eat seafood restaurant for dinner, but all three of them discover a body lying on a flood bridge.

The victim is Ryuji Kimishima, the second generation president of a famous food manufacturing company. The main suspects are his wife Aoi, a former idol and actress, and his older brother Yuta, who works in the same company.
As always, Kogoro puts himself in ridicule with his pathetic deductions.
